=== Current Issues ===
* With Ubuntu 7.04
** The live cd wont boot and it will hang in mid way (both 64bit and 32bit editions)
** Have to do the following workaround
     1. Boot with the live CD and when it shows the first menu
     2. Press 'Esc' and you will be taken to a command line.
     3. There type this line: "live pci=noapci"
     4. Hit Enter
** Refer <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=2730186&postcount=4]]</nowiki>

* With Ubuntu 7.10
** Currently under testing
** Live CD does not boot properly
*** Hangs at "Starting DHCP D-Bus daemon dhcdbd"
** Boot parameters "live noacpi", doesn't help as in Feisty
*** Displays some error messages and screen goes blank

=== System Info ===
Hewlett-Packard
Presario V6000 (RZ897PA#ACJ)  
Rev 1
